animeDescription: The Japanese version of the traditional American camp song The Other Day I Met a Bear, composed in 1919 by Carey Morgan and Lee David. The video was animated by Yoji Kuri, accompanied by Japanese male chorus group Dark Ducks.
animeStaff: [['Dark Ducks', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Tamaki Hiroki', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Kuri Yoji', ['Animation Director']]]
